name: Trash Island (Tórbjørn Rygaard)
description:
I made this game in about a week for a school project. I wanted to try my hand at creating a sort of survival game, which funny enough, lacks any survival elements. 

The game can be completed in minutes, if you choose to collect barrels and craft a raft of those. Though if you'd rather avoid getting chased down by the demons, building the raft out of trash is the way to go.

You can chop down trees for wood, and every once in a while, a piece of trash washes up on the island for you to collect.

The crafting menu can be accessed with TAB.
